column5: Chip the ice off the driveway, or the postman won't deliver  Learned that the hard way this week  Oh well, it was good exercise!  Joey
ohhh dont be a baby!!!lol takin ccmt out today(friday) so we'll how it goeslol thank god for hotshots  lol

Drive around Scarborough and look for a house to buy!!!! That's the plan this winter, atleast until I find one, then I begin the long and arduous task of getting my current home up to snuff,  for sale! HH

Well a womans work is never done so i do not have time to get cabin fever.  How ever young man if your bored come over to port dover. Trust me i have enough to do around here that will keep you busy till next xmas never mind the spring.    So u will not have time to get cabin fever.
I'm not busy either....
Got the Leggo out again Roy?  Joey

I made my own jigheads for tubes, ball and mushroom heads also. Clean reels, got the boat ready for the next season. Made the trip to BPS, Cabela`s, Netcraft to stock up for the season and the infamous honey do list. Kemper leave the honeys alone and you will have more time to fish.
Jesus, grab an ice rod and an auger!  As for me if ice fishing isnt a possibility I sit here playing guitar for hours on end.

Well ive got two of my reels on the desk in front of me, in about 6000 pieces, this being the second time ive cleaned and regreased them this winter. You know, in case I missed something the firist time. I also respooled the steelhead rod and tied up a bunch of leaders just in case it warms up and I get some open water to fish!

do like i always do,play with my tackle,and rods,and all my fishing stuff,organize lures,lookat my maps plan trips think about new lakes and rivers to fish,read my fishing mags & books,plan my big ice fishing trip in a week or so,spool up all my rods with new line,and watch WFN,its great 24/7 fishing shows...with the amount of fishing stuff i have there is always lots to keep my busy,oh ya and chat on the board,surf the net...check out all the new fishing products for 07,price out my new bass seat for the bow of my boat,buy a new VHF marine radio for new boat,,hhhmmmmm it just keeps going so there is tons to do.....as long as its to do with fishing i can handle cabin fever but anything else drives my ...crazy     cheers  oh ya and what blyth said hrass ccmt....hi cliff thanks carol i will try to do that alot for you...lol...lol
i take this  and drive it through places like this.
Anytime Fishing Devil.......always glad to help and he is LOTS of fun to harass  lol  bly
Well I have a lack of snowmobile, and mom says that there is no way I'm using her Aztec in place of one.  dang.

I despise January so I just try to keep busy with work and stuff until it passes. Reaching February is a milestone for me. And it's almost here. I'll be celebrating groundhog day wayyyy up north. I have a job to do at a mine north of the Albany River. Also, I'm counting the days until the Daytona 500!!
Gotta love that Daytona 500 clock Dan, cool.  Joey
hey dan just like joey said,i really like your daytona 500 clock....ill take number 8 for the win he is so due for this......

Well, this is it for me. The cabin fever has set in. My trib froze up last week, so no more steelheading, and I dont ice fish. What the Heck can I do untill late february when my trib opens up and I can target the ever elusive steelhead again?
Find a scientist freeze yourself and tell him to unfreeze you when the time comes. LOL, I am not making fun of u, because if I could do that I would be first in line. LOL
En Francaise ... on dit ... t'atuer l'arable  Keep you hooks sharp.
Bug the old lady.

Crossing today off the calendar and counting the number of daya left until my next fishing trip.   I am thinking that is somewhere around the third week in June.  Must be something special going on.  Reading Posts. Waiting for the local outdoor/sports shows to come around. You know .... nothing of importance.
Maybe it's time you start ice fishing to fill the void.
SEEK AND YOU SHALL FIND!!!  OR DROP ME A LINE AND I'LL TAKE YA OUT  LOL
Carve Musky lures of course!!
Rich, I would shrivel up and die if I had to wait that long to go fishin'!
heard it was so cold in Toronto today the johns were offering the hookers  $20 to blow on their hands !

Let's see...  Fix the car Sharpen all my hooks fix lures harass ccmt organize the tackle box organize the cupboards organize the closets harass teenage daughter spend some time being ill clean the grout fix some plumbing issues harass ccmt reformat the 4 computers wash & groom the dog fix any home network issues harass teenage daughter laundry organize my mp3's organize my pictures organize pens harass ccmt  OH just kill me now!!  lol  blyght
make lures, play video games...
They don't know cold, and I don't compared to moosebunk  This morning at 8 am up in Thunder Bay.
that's what the GF is for   coold here in sudbury too, when i left this morning at 8:30 the weather network was reporting -27 and a windchill of -37
Take in a showing of An Inconvenient Truth.
To cure cabin fever, I drink beer. A lot of it.  Then summer comes and guess what, I drink beer and lots of it.

I do what I did today. Find current on a trib with a little opening in the ice and have at it. Of course I had to break open about 50 feet of sheet ice with my rod holder tied to my stringer so I could fish. It was a bit of a joke though watching 20 or so rainbow swimming around totally ignoring all the different baits I had with me.  The craziest part was everytime I smashed open more ice the bows would come cruising over to check things out. I would have thought the noise and dragging my rod holder would have spooked them. NOPE just made them swim over for a look see.
Fly tying, and hunting are what I do to keep that fever away... although it comes back afer 3 or so days of not doing some sort of hunting or fishing related activity...
Sheesh....Leave it to the women to find a list of things to do!
This Winter ? Redecorate the whole house top to bottom Get on with my carvings   Find that damned Honeydo list and destroy it!!!!!!!!!!!!   Think I might JUST try Icefishing again
Cry me a river Nippising...I'm the one married to her.....LOL.
The Lower Niagara River never freezes....one of the worlds top steelheading spots!
Comments like that will get you a list also!  lol
After all these years I should learn to keep my mouth shut.........

Well I was about to head down to the mouth today to try my luck for some steelies but when I stepped out the door my nostrils stuck together, my eyelids froze open and I could no longer breath. Note to self, do not leave the house when it is -28.
